message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. Would you like to make an offer on this item for $15000?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for this item. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $13000 for it. Would you be willing to consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to get a better deal. I can do $12500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I think we're getting close, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. I can do $12200, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not sure I want to keep negotiating, though...
